channel.title: Ridiculous Jobs
channel.description: Some jobs are just plain ridiculous. My friend just graduated from our state university as a pharmacist and is making 90,000 a year. Post jobs you think are also ridiculous.

item.title: Ridiculous Jobs
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Ollie:

I can cook super noodles, and pizza.

thats about as far as my cooking talents reach me aswell

Read full topic

item.title: Ridiculous Jobs
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Cooking anything is easy if you have a recipe to follow.

When I get stoned and hungry, I get the best ideas of food to make. And I do it all without using any recipe’s or whatever. I can cook a large range of foods Fish, pasta, burgers, pork chops, deserts, etc. I love cooking, but only when I’m stoned.

Also I never understood the point of ironing. My clothes never get wrinkly, ever. I’ve never had to iron my clothes. Once they come out of the dryer they are fine for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Ridiculous Jobs
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:51, topic:260560”][quote author=Taios link=topic=344066.msg2658202#msg2658202 date=1234013691]

Lol, girls don’t cook!! We flutter our eyelids and convince the man to do it.

Shit, why did nobody tell me this before? I was counting on finding a woman to cook for me, I can only just about do scrambled eggs on toast

I lost the recipe for toast :(…
My step-dads a chef so he does all the cooking XD
…my mums such a bad cook, once she left the plastic wrapping on a pizza and cooked it then was like ‘WOW OMG WHERE’S WRAPPER GONE’…yumyum…this tastes a bit weird…reckon i was meant to take it off?..it was like the last bit of food in the house lol.

So if you want plastic covered pizza! Go with the woman cooking for you lol XD
[/quote]
Useless. Better luck next time.

For the record, I cook numerous meals (and I’m so proud of myself for it). These meals include: Spaghetti Bolonaise, Macaroni and Cheese, other varieties of pasta, various fish (I put praprika and basil on them along with the lemon juice stuff), chicken breast, all sorts of vegetables (both steaming and boiling/draining them), steak and sausages, and so on.
I’ve got quite a bit of experience under my belt.

The only thing I’m absolutely hopeless at is ironing. =[/quote]
Ironing is the devil.
Kind of getting better at it, but I always manage to have about 10 random lines going everywhere.
I go over them and more lines show up.

I can cook anything with microwave instructions on the back.

Read full topic

that meal was a high quality +1 15$ meal.

item.description:

Hey, Greeny started it did he not? If you can’t take the heat stay out of the kitchen*

*or get back into it ya woman

Lol, girls don’t cook!! We flutter our eyelids and convince the man to do it.

Only the good looking girls can pull that one off. In which case there’s still many other uses for said chick.

BUT
If ‘non good looking’ girl dates non good looking boy then non good looking boy finds it harder to find another partner therefore non good looking boy tries to do everything non good looking girl says…and non good looking girl still does not cook
So ugly girl still gets what she wants.
[/quote]

How do you like your steak? Dinner’s at 6[/quote]
Hahaha.

item.title: Ridiculous Jobs
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:15, topic:260560”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=344066.msg2656573#msg2656573 date=1233898644]

Dairy farmer.

If you own the farm, its like 4-5 hours work a day at like 1-5K an hour.
[/quote]You are an idiot.

Also, bus drivers. They get paid outrageous amounts of money to sit on their ass all day.

My dad owns three farms. Milks once a day and gets 1000 an hour. My neighbours have 800 cows and milk twice a day (an hour each milking on the rotary) and gets around 8000 litres, which is about $8000 a day. Also, if you know how to farm, it will only need repairs every 30 years.

What? Your dad makes more money on a litre of milk, then I pay for in a store? Weird.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 12:20:53 am[/size][hr]Drug dealing is truly a rediculous job. I can grow something worth it’s weight in gold, in my closet. I can spend 500 dollars and turn it into 1000 in a matter of days. Or a weekend if I only wanna turn it into 700-800. Mushrooms paid for my truck with many modifications and a kick ass audio system. And I was smaller than small time, you can make serious cash if your smart enough to not get caught.[/quote]

This is NZD so that is like $0.5 USD a litre he gets payed.

Read full topic
